description: Build storefront shell with routing, session handling, and API client baseline
notes: Acceptance: app shell runs and protected routes enforce login. Dependencies: A001.
evidence: Implemented shell routes, session persistence, API client and route guards; router guard tests passed via node.
steps: Define app layout and route skeleton
Implement login state persistence and route guard
Create shared API request wrapper and error normalization

description: Implement product list, filter, sort, and product detail pages
notes: Acceptance: shopper can discover products and open detail page. Dependencies: W001, A002.
steps: Render category and product listing with pagination
Support basic filter and sort conditions
Render product detail with price and stock status

description: Implement cart and checkout pages connected to server-side cart and pricing APIs
notes: Acceptance: shopper can reach checkout with accurate totals. Dependencies: W002, A003, A004.
steps: Support add to cart and quantity adjustment
Show per-item and aggregate pricing breakdown
Allow address selection before placing order

description: Implement order submit, payment initiation, and payment result flow
notes: Acceptance: shopper can place an order and see payment outcome. Dependencies: W003, A005, A006.
steps: Create order submit action from checkout page
Display payment redirect or QR flow
Render success and failure status pages with retry entry

description: Implement user center pages for order history, order detail, and refund requests
notes: Acceptance: user can self-serve order and refund queries. Dependencies: W004, A007.
steps: Render paginated order list with status filters
Render order detail with shipment and timeline
Provide refund apply form and status display

description: Implement robust loading, retry, and failure-state UX for critical checkout flows
notes: Acceptance: critical pages remain usable during transient API failures. Dependencies: W003, W004.
steps: Add skeleton and pending states for async requests
Add recoverable retry patterns for transient failures
Provide actionable fallback UI for non-recoverable errors

description: Improve frontend performance and accessibility for the top purchase journey
notes: Acceptance: target page budgets and basic accessibility checks pass. Dependencies: W002, W003.
steps: Measure and optimize first contentful render for home and detail pages
Ensure keyboard navigation and form labels for checkout
Add bundle and runtime budget checks

description: Add end-to-end smoke tests covering browse, add to cart, order submit, and order query
notes: Acceptance: one-click smoke suite validates MVP flow on each release candidate. Dependencies: W004, W005, I005.
steps: Create test seed strategy for deterministic data
Implement smoke scenarios for main customer journey
Integrate smoke tests into CI gate
